title: The Comedian Taking on India’s New Censorship Law
description: The government says it’ll fact-check the internet. Kunal Kamra is challenging the IT amendments in court.

title: American College of Pediatricians Leak Exposes 10,000 Confidential Files
description: A Google Drive left public on the American College of Pediatricians’ website exposed detailed financial records, sensitive member details, and more.

title: FTX-ed Crypto Investors Are Moving Back to Hardware Wallets
description: The collapse of the exchange has pushed users back to “self-custody” products like Ledger. But those can be risky too.
